LOVED this class. Henricks is hilarious, gives clear lectures, and his practice tests are very similar to tests in class. It seems like everyone else in the class enjoyed it as well, even if chem is difficult. He can be condescending at times, but it's all in good humor. DEFINITELY TAKE HIM!!!

ALL NURSNING MAJORS TAKE THIS CLASS! Henricks is a great professor and makes class interesting. Made A's on all the tests. I thought that chemistry would be a lot harder, but Henricks makes everything so clear. Definitely recommend!

VERY easy class as long as you attend (not mandatory) and study his power point notes. He goes through his lectures at a snails pace to make sure everyone is on the same page. He is a very good professor! Your grade is maybe up of five tests and one final. The first test is pretty simple, all you have to do is memorize 40 elements. I would definalty recommend him! Cannot recommend him enough if you haven't taken chemistry before. He does plenty of practice problems and examples in class. Tests are not easy, but definitely doable. VERY good professor! Chemistry is a hard class in general, so I wouldn't say the class was easy. He is very helpful and provides study guides and I didn't even buy the book and I made an A! Take him!

Tough class if you are not natural at science- but AWESOME professor! 4 Tests plus the final are your only grades. Will take questions throughout lecture and will help you before or after class. Sarcastic sense of humor. Take him if you are a nursing major!

Y'all. He is literally the best prof! I made a C in High school chem and got an A with him! He explains everything throughly and asks if EVERYONE understands before moving on. Henricks is an awesome prof and very helpful. He goes through ppts thoroughly and will answer any question. He even has the ppts, notes, old tests, and practice worksheets on his D2L. Even though attendance was not mandatory, go. You will pass if you pay attention.

Prof. Henricks is a great, funny, and engaging professor. Go to class, even though it isn't mandatory, and you're much more likely to succeed. His tests are very straightforward. Henricks is GREAT! He sticks to the syllabus, only 5 test and the final! Come to class, listen, study and you will do great!!

Great professor! He is funny and has a lot of energy! He is helpful and understanding and gives some pretty big curves on a couple of tests.
